relation.text: 1808 My Dear Sister , Your puzzle s
met with , in a six Weeks
Christmas , at Dunkeld , & Sir John M. Murray escorts
tomorrow . My Carriage is just gone
the end of February next . I hate
go to the Meeting of the House in January
admired in it . Being a firm Believer in the fulfilment of Prophecy , I have for many Years
published a Treatise on the Revelation of S t . John , Anno 1593
wishes to my Countrywoman Edinburgh , Twelfth December 1808
